Mia woke up excited for her birthday, but when she opened her bedroom door, silence greeted her. Confused, she tiptoed downstairs, where her family had planned an invisible birthday party. Balloons floated in the air, a cake sat on the table, and friends whispered cheerful wishes. Mia laughed, realizing they had used their imaginations to create a magical experience. Each friend was invisible, represented by colorful outlines and shimmering lights. They played games, shared stories, and danced, filling the room with joy. As the clock struck twelve, Mia blew out her imaginary candles, her heart swelling with love and laughter, knowing she was never truly alone.
